divs: sighting detailsever since my sighting on 8\20\12 i have been observing the night sky. my first night sky watching i noted a star-like object just before the sun went down, it was the first star out and much lower than a typical star. after watching it really close i noticed it would move up and down and side to side. it would even do circles at times. day 2 i had my binoculars and when viewed i discovered the object had red\blue and white blinking lights. day 3 i noticed many more of the same object but spread miles apart. one directly above my head. i have never seen these star-like objects in the sky before. i only noticed them after my very close visual on 8\20\12. which tues the 21 of aug two more people have told me they saw the same thing i saw. 1:hovering over the municipal airport at 1pm. the second eye witness over a school at 7:30pm. i would like to know what those strobes are in the sky. do they lay out a path for airplane traffic? multiple
trends: There has been one other sighting in Peru
There was one other sighting in Peru on or around August 21st 2012
